person.persName: William Dixon (Harlan County farmer and soldier)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer and soldier. Lived in Harlan County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Mary Dixon. Father of Catharine Dixon, William Dixon, Jr., Martha Dixon, Sally Dixon, Elizabeth Dixon, John Dixon, Mary Dixon, and Nancy. Served as quarter-master of the Harlan County Battalion of Kentucky State Militia from October 1862 to January 1863.
